Tamil Nadu.name: Sahodari Foundation
Tamil Nadu.description: India's first transgender-led organization focusing on education, entrepreneurship, and creative arts for transgender individuals.

Tamil Nadu.name: SAATHII
Tamil Nadu.description: Works to strengthen healthcare access, rights, and social inclusion for LGBTQIA+ individuals, especially transgender and hijra communities.

Tamil Nadu.name: Orinam
Tamil Nadu.description: Chennai-based collective working for alternate sexualities and gender identities; supports queer, transgender folks, their families and community.

Tamil Nadu.name: Thozhi Women's Collective
Tamil Nadu.description: Empowering women through skill development, entrepreneurship training, and providing support for domestic violence survivors.

Delhi.name: TWEET Foundation
Delhi.description: A transgender-led community-based organization supporting transgender persons through advocacy, skill training, and employment opportunities.

Delhi.name: Naz Foundation
Delhi.description: Delhi-based NGO advocating for sexual health, HIV/AIDS awareness, and equal rights for women and LGBTQIA+ individuals.

Delhi.name: Centre for Equity and Inclusion (CEQUIN)
Delhi.description: Working on women's rights, gender-based violence, public space safety and economic inclusion.

Delhi.name: Shakti Shalini
Delhi.description: Providing support and shelter to women facing domestic violence and working towards gender equality through education and advocacy.

Maharashtra.name: Akshara Centre
Maharashtra.description: Promoting gender equality, women's safety, and empowerment through education and digital awareness.

Maharashtra.name: SheSays India
Maharashtra.description: Promoting gender equality, women's rights, including redressal mechanisms for gender-based violence.

Maharashtra.name: Kinnar Maa Trust
Maharashtra.description: Supporting the transgender community through healthcare, education, and employment initiatives.

Karnataka.name: DEAR India Ministries
Karnataka.description: Empowering transgender persons through education, vocational training, rehabilitation and medical care.

Karnataka.name: Swabhava Trust
Karnataka.description: Supporting LGBTQIA+ individuals through counseling, peer support, and advocacy for inclusive policies.

Kerala.name: DhiEva
Kerala.description: Promotes mental wellness, social equity, quality education and counselling support for women, children & LGBTQ individuals.

Kerala.name: Queerala
Kerala.description: Supporting LGBTQIA+ individuals through community building, advocacy, and mental health support.

Rajasthan.name: Sambhali Trust
Rajasthan.description: Empowering women and marginalised gender minorities via education, vocational training, shelter & legal support.

West Bengal.name: Sappho for Equality
West Bengal.description: Supporting lesbian, bisexual women and trans persons through advocacy, research, and community building.

West Bengal.name: Durbar Mahila Samanwaya Committee
West Bengal.description: Working for the rights and welfare of women, particularly focusing on health and social justice.

Telangana.name: Transgender Welfare Society
Telangana.description: Supporting transgender individuals through healthcare, education, and employment initiatives.

Gujarat.name: Vikalp Women's Group
Gujarat.description: Working for women's rights and empowerment through legal aid, counseling, and skill development.

Uttarakhand.name: Humans For Humanity
Uttarakhand.description: Educating women and girls on menstrual health and hygiene across multiple states.

Pan India.name: Wajood Project
Pan India.description: Community-led initiative for transgender & hijra populations providing HIV & sexual health services, rights awareness and violence prevention.

Pan India.name: AJSA India – Gender Justice Program
Pan India.description: Champions gender equality, women's and girls' health & rights with legal support and community outreach.

Pan India.name: National Alliance for Women's Rights
Pan India.description: Working across India to promote women's rights, gender equality, and access to justice through advocacy and capacity building.
